body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Hotel Paradise customer service. My name is Adam Rodriguez. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Jacqueline. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have some questions about the pricing. It seems a bit confusing to me.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Sure, I'd be happy to help clarify the pricing for you. Can you please provide me with your email address and phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My email address is jhughes@example.com and my phone number is 555-123-4567.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Jacqueline. Just to confirm, your email address is jhughes at example dot com and your phone number is five five five dash one two three dash four five six seven, correct?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Thank you, Jacqueline, for sharing those details with me. I will now review the pricing information and provide you with a clear explanation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Jacqueline. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day! Goodbye.
